message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the price I'm willing to pay.
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I'm not sure I can go as high as $110, but I'm willing to meet you at $90. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $90, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to sell it to you at that price. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $105.
I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product. That's my best offer.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115, which is my final offer.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product. That's my final offer.
I'm not going to budge on the price, Bob. I think this product is worth more than $85, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $112.50.
I'm still not willing to pay more than $85 for the product. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'd like to buy the product for $85.
